lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Sasha Sloan
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Sasha Sloan
[00:02.000] 编曲 : 谭立波
[00:03.88]原唱：Sasha Sloan
[00:13.94]
[00:15.46]Yelling at the sky
[00:18.43]Screaming at the world
[00:21.78]Baby, why'd you go away?
[00:23.97]I’m still your girl
[00:28.50]Holding on too tight
[00:31.58]Head up in the clouds
[00:35.09]Heaven only knows where you are now
[00:41.67]How do I love, how do I love again?
[00:48.31]How do I trust,how do I trust again?
[00:57.43]I stay up all night
[01:00.13]Tell myself I'm alright
[01:03.50]Baby, you're just harder to see than most
[01:10.99]I put the record on
[01:13.42]Wait ’til I hear our song
[01:16.75]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[01:23.93]Every night I'm dancing with your ghost
[01:30.23]
[01:41.39]Never got the chance
[01:45.26]To say you last goodbye
[01:48.32]I gotta move on
[01:50.84]But it hurts to try
[01:55.19]How do I love, how do I love again?
[02:01.65]How do I trust,how do I trust again?
[02:07.53]I stay up all night

[02:20.96]I put the record on
[02:23.36]Wait 'til I hear our song

[02:42.12]How do I love,how do I love again?
[02:48.56]How do I trust, how do I trust again?
[02:57.70]I stay up all night
[03:00.13]Tell myself I’m alright
[03:03.40]Baby, you’re just harder to see than most
[03:10.95]I put the record on
[03:13.56]Wait 'til I hear our song
[03:17.16]Every night I’m dancing with your ghost
[03:23.84]Every night I’m dancing with your ghost
[03:30.27]Every night I’m dancing with your ghost
[03:37.37]Every night I’m dancing with your ghost
[03:45.47]Yelling at the sky
[03:48.88]Screaming at the world
[03:52.13]Baby, why'd you go away?
[03:54.46]I’m still your girl
[03:59.70]
[03:59.534] 音乐总监：刘卓
[03:59.998] 乐队总监/program：尹之扬
[04:00.462] 吉他：熊林/高恭鹏
[04:00.926] 贝斯：娄弘荻
[04:01.390] 鼓：祁大为
[04:01.854] 键盘：孙莉
[04:02.318] 和声：张炜/林灵

[04:03.246] 混音：佟尚泽@唯伴音乐
[04:03.710] 音频编辑：石行@唯伴音乐
